title: Duller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Every 2 nights you may liquify in front of a players house

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Any player who visits your target will be consumed by you
-You are invincible on the night you liquify, because you’re a liquid, and you can’t really hurt a liquid

desc:
Post 2646
_Some water! Looks murky, but it’s better than nothing!_
